comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content:
This is Captain Frank E. Beadnell, longtime Captain for White Star Lines. He commanded the SS Cymric during World War I, and was in command when it was torpedoed in 1916.

The New York Times, 16 April 1927.

(Name misspelled on photo.)

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you Cynthia Wenslow for your information on Frank Beadnell.  I see that the spelling of his name has not been consistent. We will correct it in the record the next time we update.
